definition: to collect material
to take/to get/to choose/to fetch
material/timber/ability/aptitude/a capable individual/coffin (old)
to draw on local resources/using materials at hand

sentences.english: The novel go since a ture story.
sentences.chinese: 这小说取材于一个真事的历史。

sentences.english: It features walls of locally sourced Valser quartzite slabs and a grass roof.
sentences.chinese: 它的墙壁就地取材于瓦尔斯的英岩板和草屋顶。

sentences.english: The time for sampling is suggested between 6-7 gestation weeks.
sentences.chinese: 提出绒毛取材时间以孕6～7周最适宜。

sentences.english: The Four Masterworks by Tang Xianzu drew materials from the novels of the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “临川四梦”直接或间接地取材于唐代小说。

sentences.english: This novel has drawn its materials from real life.
sentences.chinese: 这本小说取材于现实生活。

sentences.english: Only one guessed that it was a picture from the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个猜测，那是一幅取材自“圣经”的图片。

sentences.english: The characters are mostly taken from Chinese mythology and adventure pulps.
sentences.chinese: 角色大多取材于中国神话和冒险故事。

sentences.english: "Painted Skin" is adapted from the ancient novel "Liaozhai Zhiyi", or "Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio", written by Pu Songling in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《画皮》取材于清代蒲松龄的古代小说《聊斋志异》。

sentences.english: Watership auspicious festive magpie and form full of persimmon.
sentences.chinese: 取材于吉祥喜庆的喜鹊和形态饱满的柿子。

sentences.english: The ancient tablets and steles in Nanjing area were largely made of limestone quarried from here.
sentences.chinese: 古代南京地区的碑刻，大多取材于此。

sentences.english: Upscale restaurants take this dish so seriously that some even have their own duck farms and use only a special kind of duck for their specific Peking Duck dish.
sentences.chinese: 一些高级饭店的烤鸭甚至取材于自家的养鸭场。

sentences.english: The twigs used for this purpose were from aromatic trees and therefore freshened the mouth, as well as cleaning it.
sentences.chinese: 它取材于香料树，为的是清新和清洁口腔。

sentences.english: So that when i iet photographed, your work ends up in "w"?
sentences.chinese: 到时我被拍照取材你的作品就会上报了？

sentences.english: Conveniently, silicon is not a bad material for making optical devices.
sentences.chinese: 硅取材方便，是一种制作光学设备很不错的材料。

sentences.english: The dark wood framing the design is made of locally-sourced oak.
sentences.chinese: 黑色的木质框架取材于当地的橡树。

sentences.english: With the advantages of easily obtained structure and strong durability, stone arch bridges are widely used.
sentences.chinese: 石拱桥因取材方便和耐久性强的优点而被广泛采用。

fine/meticulous/careful

lit. new bud/fig. new and original
